snippet: A seal was lifted Tuesday on part of a suit filed against Dolores M. Troiani and Bebe H. Kivitz, who have represented Andrea Constand.
abstract: Federal Judge Steven T O’Neill partially unseals court records, revealing that Bill Cosby filed civil suit in Pennsylvania against lawyers Dolores M Troiani and Bebe H Kivitz, who represented Andrea Constand when she brought sexual assault charges against Cosby in 2004; suit was filed two days before Troiani and Kivitz were to testify at pre-trial hearing for criminal sexual assault case against Cosby.

byline.original: By GRAHAM BOWLEY and SYDNEY EMBER

lead_paragraph: A seal was lifted Tuesday on part of a suit filed against Dolores M. Troiani and Bebe H. Kivitz, who have represented Andrea Constand.

headline.main: Bill Cosby Sued Accuser’s Lawyers on Eve of His Criminal Hearing
headline.print_headline: Cosby Filed Suit Against Accuser’s Lawyers on Eve of Criminal Hearing
